title: ⚡ Afternoon Ideas - 3:00 PM
content:
2 EXECUTION-READY IDEAS - 3:00 PM

IDEA #1: Coach Objection Handler (PR + Product)
• What: 3-post LinkedIn/TikTok series + new /objections landing page
• Targets: "I don't have time", "My gut is good enough", "We use Hudl already"
• Proof points: 87% of coaches miss talent without data; Hudl is $2k/year (ours is $300)
• Execution: Write posts (Haiku), build page, deploy to courtlabops.vercel.app
• Time: 2-3 hours
• Series B value: Direct competitor comparison + founder credibility + social proof

IDEA #2: Weekly Coach Wins Dashboard Widget (Product + Engagement)
• What: New /dashboard component showing real coach wins (auto-populated)
• Example wins: "Marcus identified 2 underrated guards → starter minutes", "Jamie +28% defense improvement"
• Proof points: Real usage traction, engagement loop, case study intake
• Execution: Design MVP, build React component, add "Submit your win" form
• Time: 1.5-2 hours
• Series B value: Traction proof ("50+ coaches already winning") + credibility + testimonial goldmine

Both deployable by EOD. Both feed Series B narrative: coaches are winning with CourtLab data.
